title: Hungary's election could further divide Europe
text:
Hungary's election could further divide Europe 4:58pm BST - 01:56 
Hungary's Viktor Orban, Europe's hard-liner on immigration, on Friday hailed his common eurosceptic path with Poland's right-wing government as he headed into an election which seems certain to hand him a third straight term in power.   
Hungary's Viktor Orban, Europe's hard-liner on immigration, on Friday hailed his common eurosceptic path with Poland's right-wing government as he headed into an election which seems certain to hand him a third straight term in power.  //reut.rs/2HiRXd2
